quotes.quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I'm possible.
Close your eyes and imagine the best version of you possible. That’s who you really are. Let go of any part of you that doesn’t believe it.
Man needs difficulties; they are necessary for health.
Wholeness is not achieved by cutting off a portion of one’s being, but by integration of the contraries.
Sickness is the vengeance of nature for the violation of her laws.
We repeat what we don’t repair.
Happiness is the highest form of health.
Every negative belief weakens the partnership between mind and body.

Wounds don’t heal the way we want them to, they heal the way they need to. It takes time for wounds to fade into scars. It takes time for the process of healing to take place. Give yourself that time. Give yourself that grace. Be gentle with your wounds. Be gentle with your heart. You deserve to heal.
Time And health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
Prevention is better than cure.
Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
The greatest miracle on Earth is the human body. It is stronger and wiser than you may realize, and improving its ability to self-heal is within your control.
Rest and self-care are so important. When you take time to replenish your spirit, it allows you to serve others from the overflow. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
To feel aroused is to feel alive. Having great sex is like taking in huge lungfuls of fresh air, essential to your body, essential to your health, and essential to your life.

One life on this earth is all that we get, whether it is enough or not enough, and the obvious conclusion would seem to be that at the very least we are fools if we do not live it as fully and bravely and beautifully as we can.
Exercise should be regarded as a tribute to the heart.
It's a funny thing about life, once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack.
Health isn’t about being ‘perfect’ with food or exercise or herbs. Health is about balancing those things with your desires. It’s about nourishing your spirit as well as your body.
What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
Health is a large word.  It embraces not the body only, but the mind and spirit as well;…and not today's pain or pleasure alone, but the whole being and outlook of a man.
People who laugh actually live longer than those who don’t laugh. Few persons realize that health actually varies according to the amount of laughter.
Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
Health is much more dependent on our habits and nutrition than on medicine.
Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt.
Symptoms are not enemies to be destroyed, but sacred messengers who encourage us to take better care of ourselves.
Physical fitness is the first requisite of happiness.
There's a lot of people in this world who spend so much time watching their health that they haven’t the time to enjoy it.
The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
The root of all health is in the brain. The trunk of it is in emotion. The branches and leaves are the body. The flower of health blooms when all parts work together.
It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
I take my only exercise acting as a pallbearer at the funerals of my friends who exercise regularly.
If you don't like something change it; if you can't change it, change the way you think about it.
Three things in life – your health, your mission, and the people you love. That’s it.

Doctors won’t make you healthy. Nutritionists won’t make you slim. Teachers won’t make you smart. Gurus won’t make you calm. Mentors won’t make you rich. Trainers won’t make you fit. Ultimately, you have to take responsibility. Save yourself.
Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.

You can learn to follow the inner self, the inner physician that tells you where to go. Healing is simply attempting to do more of those things that bring joy and fewer of those things that bring pain.
Men worry over the great number of diseases, while doctors worry over the scarcity of effective remedies.
The... patient should be made to understand that he or she must take charge of his own life.  Don't take your body to the doctor as if he were a repair shop.
A healthy outside starts from the inside.
The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.
It is part of the cure to wish to be cured.
The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, or not to anticipate troubles, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly.
Healing is the end of conflict with yourself.
It is the cheerful mind persevering. It is the strong mind that hews its way through a thousand difficulties.
Health is a relationship between you and your body.
Keeping your body healthy is an expression of gratitude to the whole cosmos- the trees, the clouds, everything.
The doctor of the future will give no medicine, but will instruct his patients in care of the human frame, in diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.
The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
Exercise not only changes your body, it changes your mind, your attitude and your mood.
Your body will be around a lot longer than that expensive handbag. Invest in yourself.
Just because you're not sick doesn't mean you're healthy.
The greatest wealth is health.
I have chosen to be happy because it is good for my health.
I know this transformation is painful, but you’re not falling apart; you’re just falling into something different, with a new capacity to be beautiful.
To insure good health: eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness, and maintain an interest in life.
Health is a state of complete mental, social and physical well-being, not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.
The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
Life is not merely being alive, but being well.
Those who do not find time for exercise will have to find time for illness.
Without health, life is not life; it is only a state of languor and suffering.

Until man duplicates a blade of grass, nature can laugh at his so-called scientific knowledge. Remedies from chemicals will never stand in favor compared with the products of nature, the living cell of the plant, the final result of the rays of the sun, the mother of all life.
He who has health has hope, and he who has hope has everything
Sickness is felt, but health not at all.
Measure your health by your sympathy with morning and Spring.
Health is the first muse, and sleep is the condition to produce it.

The power of love to change bodies is legendary, built into folklore, common sense, and everyday experience. Love moves the flesh, it pushes matter around. Throughout history,  tender loving care' has uniformly been recognized as a valuable element in healing.
He who takes medicine and neglects to diet wastes the skill of his doctors.
If you have health, you probably will be happy, and if you have health and happiness, you have the wealth you need, even if it is not all you want.
To keep the body in good health is a duty, otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
A vigorous five-mile walk will do more good for an unhappy but otherwise healthy adult than all the medicine and psychology in the world.
The trouble with always trying to preserve the health of the body is that it is so difficult to do without destroying the health of the mind.
One should eat to live, not live to eat.
If you don't take care of yourself, the undertaker will overtake that responsibility for you.
Nothing is more fatal to health than an over care of it.
Preserving the health by too strict a regimen is a wearisome malady.
It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
A fit, healthy body that is the best fashion statement.
Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
When health is absent, wisdom cannot reveal itself, art cannot manifest, strength cannot fight, wealth becomes useless, and intelligence cannot be applied.
The First wealth is health.
Any food that requires enhancing by the use of chemical substances should in no way be considered a food.
The food you eat can be either the safest and most powerful form of medicine or the slowest form of poison.
Eat food. Not too much. Mostly plants.
Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
Don't eat anything your great-grandmother wouldn't recognize as food.
The body is like a piano, and happiness is like music. It is needful to have the instrument in good order.
A healthy body is a guest-chamber for the soul; a sick body is a prison.
You pray for good health and a body that will be strong in old age. Good   but your rich foods block the gods' answer and tie Jupiter's hands.
Health and intellect are the two blessings of life.
The groundwork of all happiness is health.
The part can never be well unless the whole is well.
The scientific truth may be put quite briefly; eat moderately, having an ordinary mixed diet, and don't worry
Sedentary people are apt to have sluggish minds. A sluggish mind is apt to be reflected in flabbiness of body and in a dullness of expression that invites no interest and gets none.
A man's health can be judged by which he takes two at a time-pills or stairs.
Physical fitness is not only one of the most iportant keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor's book.
Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind and spirit. When one is free from physical disabilities and mental distractions, the gates of the soul open.
Happiness lies, first of all, in health.
Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being, while movement and methodical physical exercise save it and preserve it.

The human body has been designed to resist an infinite number of changes and attacks brought about by its environment. The secret of good health lies in successful adjustment to changing stresses on the body.
Each patient carries his own doctor inside him.
It is easier to change a man's religion than to change his diet.
Eating crappy food isn't a reward   it's a punishment.
Sorry, there s no magic bullet. You gotta eat healthy and live healthy to be healthy and look healthy. End of story.
About eighty percent of the food on shelves of supermarkets today didn't exist 100 years ago.
